mapper.select: SELECT no, title, poster, nameKor, opendate, r FROM(SELECT no, title, poster, nameKor, opendate, rownum r FROM(SELECT m.no, m.title, poster, c.name_kor nameKor, m.opendate FROM movies m, m_countries mc, Countries c WHERE m.no = mc.movie_no AND mc.contry_no = c.no)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into reviews(no, movie_no, member_no, score, regdate) values (surveys_seq.nextval, #{movieNo}, #{memberNo}, #{score}, systimestamp)
